ValidationRule.description: NOKIASC-31032: Should fire when below conditions fail: - Vendor Contract Record Type. - Start Date < Paid End Date <= End Date.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(RecordType.DeveloperName = 'CH_VendorContract' , NOT(ISBLANK(CH_PaidToEndDate__c)) , ( ( NOT( StartDate < CH_PaidToEndDate__c ) && NOT(ISBLANK(StartDate ))) || ( NOT( CH_PaidToEndDate__c <= EndDate) && (NOT(ISBLANK(EndDate )))) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: "Paid End Date" cannot be prior to Start date nor later than End Date".
